```{r LaTeXspecimens, results="asis"}
if (knitr_chunk == "latex") {
  cat(
    "\\setlength{\\parindent}{0.5in}",
    "\\setlength{\\leftskip}{0in}",
    "\\setlength{\\parskip}{12pt}",
    "\\doublespacing",
    "\\hspace*{-0.5in}",
    "# (APPENDIX) Appendix {-}",
    "<!-- Specimen appendix TeX files -->",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-medicinae}",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-vitulifera}",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-integrifolia}",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-didymocarpa}",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-brassicoides}",
    "\\input{TeX/specimens-P-acutifolia}",
    sep = "\n"
    )
  }
```
